name: Hresh Blast
description:
Hresh Blast is a puzzle game for children and adults!

Just click on two or more blocks of the same color.
Make combinations of 2 or more monsters with the same color to remove them. Clear the board from all the monsters to win the game.

Each stage has a target point to reach the next level.
The more monsters you remove, the more points you will get.

If you get to clear all the monsters, you will get many bonuses!

Good luck :)
